articles.content:
Film show marks Cuban leader's Korea visit
     Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The Foreign Ministry gave a film show on March 11 to mark the 13th anniversary of Korea visit of Fidel Castro Ruz, the supreme leader of the Cuban Revolution.   Present on invitation were Cuban ambassador to Korea Jose Manuel Inclan Embade and embassy officials.   Present were vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Pak Kil Yon  and officials concerned.   The participants appreciated a Korean documentary film on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's on-site guidance over various domains.
